title: Kale and Lentil Soup
directions: Add the veggie broth, lentils, carrots, onions, kale, and garlic to a large pot
Bring to a boil and let cook until the lentils are tender (about 15-20 minutes)
Stir in the red pepper flakes, parlsey, and lemon zest
ingredients: 1 bunch Kale (remove stem and roughly chop)
